title: BP to assist with travel expenses for U.S. employees following abortion ruling
text:
BP is the latest company offering to cover travel costs for employees who need to cross state lines for medical care. Procter & Gamble Co. PG, Target Corp. TGT and Kroger Co. KR are among the latest companies to say they would provide benefits for workers who need to travel for abortions.

BP to assist with travel expenses for U.S. employees following abortion ruling
